• {{ task.text }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.scss'], }) export class TodoComponent { tasks = [ { text: 'task 1', complete: false, }, { text: 'task 2', complete: true, }, { text: 'task 2', complete: true, }, ]; addTodo(value: string) { this.tasks.push({ text: 'task 4', complete: false }); } }
